option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<resources> <!-- Base application theme. --> <style name="Theme.ExpM" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.DarkActionBar"> <!-- Primary brand color. --> <item name="colorPrimary">@color/purple_500</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@color/purple_700</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/white</item> <!-- Secondary brand color. --> <item name="colorSecondary">@color/teal_200</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">@color/teal_700</item> <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/black</item> <!-- Status bar color. --> <item name="android:statusBarColor">?attr/colorPrimaryVariant</item> <!-- Customize your theme here. --> </style>
<!-- Splash theme: uses a windowBackground drawable for the native launch screen --> <style name="Theme.ExpM.Splash" parent="Theme.ExpM"> <item name="android:windowBackground">@drawable/splash_window_background</item> <item name="android:windowFullscreen">true</item> </style> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<resources> <!-- Base application theme. --> <style name="Theme.ExpM" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.DarkActionBar"> <!-- Primary brand color. --> <item name="colorPrimary">@color/purple_500</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@color/purple_700</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/white</item> <!-- Secondary brand color. --> <item name="colorSecondary">@color/teal_200</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">@color/teal_700</item> <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/black</item> <!-- Status bar color. --> <item name="android:statusBarColor">?attr/colorPrimaryVariant</item> <!-- Customize your theme here. --> </style>
<!-- Splash theme: uses a windowBackground drawable for the native launch screen --> <style name="Theme.ExpM.Splash" parent="Theme.ExpM"> <item name="android:windowBackground">@drawable/splash_window_background</item> <item name="android:windowFullscreen">true</item> </style> </resources>
